name: Plugin Architecture Sprites
description: Sprite library for plugin architecture visualization components

box.name: Package Box
box.description: Main container box for plugin packages
box.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="420" height="140" rx="8" fill="#2d3748" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="2"/>

shadow.name: Package Shadow
shadow.description: Drop shadow effect for plugin packages
shadow.svg: <ellipse cx="210" cy="135" rx="200" ry="15" fill="#000" opacity="0.2"/>

label.name: Package Label
label.svg: <rect x="10" y="10" width="200" height="30" rx="4" fill="#4299e1" stroke="#3182ce"/><text x="110" y="28" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="14" font-weight="bold">Plugin Package</text>

glyphs.name: Package Glyphs
glyphs.svg: <g opacity="0.5"><circle cx="350" cy="30" r="8" fill="#a0aec0"/><rect x="340" y="50" width="20" height="20" rx="2" fill="#a0aec0"/><polygon points="345,80 355,80 350,90" fill="#a0aec0"/></g>

npm-badge.name: NPM Badge
npm-badge.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="28" rx="14" fill="#cb3837"/><text x="40" y="18" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="12" font-weight="bold">npm</text>

card.name: Manifest Card
card.description: Main card container for plugin manifests
card.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="420" height="140" rx="8" fill="#1a202c" stroke="#00d9ff" stroke-width="2"/>

braces.name: JSON Braces
braces.svg: <text x="20" y="40" fill="#00d9ff" font-size="24" font-weight="bold">{</text><text x="380" y="120" fill="#00d9ff" font-size="24" font-weight="bold">}</text>

rows.name: Manifest Rows
rows.svg: <g fill="#e2e8f0" font-size="12"><text x="40" y="60">\"name\": \"my-plugin\",</text><text x="40" y="80">\"version\": \"1.0.0\",</text><text x="40" y="100">\"handlers\": [\"onDragStart\"]</text></g>

stamp.name: Generated Stamp
stamp.svg: <rect x="320" y="10" width="80" height="20" rx="10" fill="#38a169" opacity="0.8"/><text x="360" y="22" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="10">GENERATED</text>

tabs.name: Manifest Tabs
tabs.svg: <g fill="#4a5568"><rect x="0" y="0" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/><rect x="65" y="0" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/><rect x="130" y="0" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/></g><g fill="#a0aec0" font-size="10"><text x="30" y="12" text-anchor="middle">routes</text><text x="95" y="12" text-anchor="middle">topics</text><text x="160" y="12" text-anchor="middle">handlers</text></g>

handlers.name: Handlers Export
handlers.description: Components for visualizing handler exports and connections

connectors.name: Handler Connectors
connectors.svg: <g stroke="#4c1d95" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.3"><path d="M30 80 Q150 80 270 80"/><path d="M30 100 Q150 100 270 100"/><circle cx="30" cy="80" r="4" fill="#4c1d95"/><circle cx="30" cy="100" r="4" fill="#4c1d95"/></g>

ports.name: Handler Ports
ports.svg: <g><rect x="280" y="65" width="120" height="24" rx="12" fill="#553c9a" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="1"/><text x="340" y="79" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="11" font-weight="500">onDragStart</text><rect x="280" y="95" width="130" height="24" rx="12" fill="#553c9a" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="1"/><text x="345" y="109" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="10" font-weight="500">publishCreateRequested</text></g>

gradient.name: Handler Gradient Arc
gradient.description: Main neon arc with gradient and animation
gradient.svg: <path d="M 30 90 C 180 50, 270 50, 390 90" stroke="url(#violetArc)" stroke-width="4" fill="none" filter="url(#glow)"/><path d="M 30 90 C 180 50, 270 50, 390 90" stroke="#d6bcfa" stroke-width="1.2" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="8 8"><animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="0" to="-1000" dur="6s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></path>

traces.name: Handler Traces
traces.svg: <g stroke="#a78bfa" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" opacity="0.6"><path d="M390 85 L420 75"/><path d="M390 90 L420 85"/><path d="M390 95 L420 95"/><path d="M390 100 L420 105"/><polygon points="415,73 420,75 415,77" fill="#a78bfa"/><polygon points="415,83 420,85 415,87" fill="#a78bfa"/><polygon points="415,93 420,95 415,97" fill="#a78bfa"/><polygon points="415,103 420,105 415,107" fill="#a78bfa"/></g>

build.name: Build & Publish
build.description: Components for visualizing build and publish processes

conveyor.name: Build Conveyor
conveyor.description: Conveyor belt for build process visualization

stage.name: Build Stage
stage.svg: <rect x="300" y="40" width="80" height="60" rx="8" fill="#2d3748" stroke="#4a5568"/><text x="340" y="75" text-anchor="middle" fill="#e2e8f0" font-size="12">STAGE</text>

tags.name: Version Tags
tags.svg: <g fill="#f6ad55"><rect x="320" y="20" width="40" height="15" rx="7"/><text x="340" y="30" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="10">v1.0</text></g>

uplink.name: Upload Link
uplink.svg: <path d="M340 40 L340 10 L350 20 M340 10 L330 20" stroke="#f6ad55" stroke-width="3" fill="none"/>

host.name: Host SDK
host.description: Components for visualizing host SDK and runtime environment

console.name: Host Console
console.description: Main console container for host SDK
console.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="420" height="140" rx="8" fill="#2d3748" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="2"/>

rails.name: Data Rails
rails.description: Data flow rails in host environment

ports.name: Host Ports
ports.svg: <g fill="#4a5568"><rect x="20" y="30" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/><rect x="20" y="90" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/><rect x="340" y="30" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/><rect x="340" y="90" width="60" height="20" rx="4"/></g><g fill="#a0aec0" font-size="10"><text x="50" y="42" text-anchor="middle">IN</text><text x="50" y="102" text-anchor="middle">OUT</text><text x="370" y="42" text-anchor="middle">CTRL</text><text x="370" y="102" text-anchor="middle">DATA</text></g>

modules.name: Host Modules
modules.svg: <g><rect x="120" y="25" width="80" height="30" rx="4" fill="#553c9a"/><text x="160" y="42" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="11">Conductor</text><rect x="220" y="85" width="80" height="30" rx="4" fill="#553c9a"/><text x="260" y="102" text-anchor="middle" fill="white" font-size="11">EventRouter</text></g>

filters.name: Soft Shadow
filters.description: Soft drop shadow effect for cards and containers
filters.svg: <filter id="softShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%"><feDropShadow dx="0" dy="4" stdDeviation="8" flood-color="#000" flood-opacity="0.35"/></filter>

filters.name: Glow Effect
filters.description: Glow effect for neon and highlighted elements

gradients.name: Violet Arc Gradient
gradients.description: Purple to violet gradient for energy connectors
gradients.svg: <linearGradient id="violetArc" x1="0" y1="0" x2="1" y2="1"><stop offset="0" stop-color="#8b5cf6"/><stop offset="1" stop-color="#a78bfa"/></linearGradient>
